financial.title: Trusted Partner for Korea–India Business Success
financial.subtitle: with Clarity and Confidence
financial.description: We're a team of expert consultants committed to helping businesses make strategic decisions for successful expansion between Korea and India with tailored strategies and trusted guidance

mission.label: Our Mission
mission.title: Driven by Purpose, Guided by Results
mission.desc: Our mission is to help Korean companies enter, settle, and grow in India with confidence. We do this by: Structuring India business entry as a system, not a series of disconnected actions. Bridging strategy and execution through a single-window, end-to-end approach. Aligning headquarters strategy with Indian market realities, regulations, and culture. Reducing risk while enabling sustainable, long-term growth. STARAJIN exists to ensure that strong intent is matched with strong execution in India.

vision.label: Our Vision
vision.title: To be the most trusted architect and facilitation partner for Korea–India business expansion and cooperation.
vision.desc: STARAJIN envisions a future where Korean companies succeed in India not by trial and error, but through well-designed structures, deep local understanding, and sustainable partnerships. We aim to set the benchmark for how cross-border businesses between Korea and India are planned, executed, and scaled—responsibly, efficiently, and with long-term impact.

values.label: Our Core Values
values.title: Trust | Structure | Cultural Intelligence | Strategy | Sustainability
values.desc: The Principles That Guide Every Step We Take. At the heart of our consulting practice lies a clear set of values that shape every relationship, decision, and solution we deliver. These principles guide our commitment to excellence in Korea-India business facilitation. Integrity and transparency in all business dealings. Cultural sensitivity and respect for diversity. Excellence in service delivery and client satisfaction.

choose.title: Integrated Strategy. Coordinated Execution.
choose.subtitle: One Seamless System
choose.description: Many companies entering India face the same challenge: a well-defined strategy that becomes difficult to implement in a complex and unfamiliar environment. At STARAJIN, strategy is never separated from execution. From the beginning, we design market entry and expansion plans with implementation in mind — ensuring that decisions made at headquarters translate effectively into on-the-ground operations in India.

achievements.experienceDesc: 18 years of experience in India with experts & Knowhows
achievements.networkDesc: Built an intimate network across Korean-Indian government, companies, and institutions
achievements.casesDesc: Many success stories with data-driven, customized strategies
achievements.supportDesc: Comprehensive support from market entry to growth

solution.title: Our Journey
solution.subtitle: From India Immersion to Bilateral Impact

2017.title: Foundation & India Immersion
2017.desc: Deep engagement with the Indian market begins through consulting, advisory, and on-ground execution roles. Extensive exposure to Indian regulatory systems, industry structures, and business culture lays the groundwork for Starajin's India-first expertise.

2019.title: Conceptualization of Starajin
2019.desc: Recognition of a recurring gap between Korea–India strategy and execution leads to the formal conceptualization of Starajin as a structured, bilateral market-entry and facilitation platform.

2020.title: Starajin Founded in Korea
2020.desc: Starajin officially begins as a business consulting and services company in Seongnam-si, Gyeonggi-do, Korea, focusing on Korea–India business strategy, market entry support, due diligence, G2B facilitation, investment advisory, and business development services.

2021.title: Early Korea–India Engagements
2021.desc: During its early operations, Starajin deepens engagement with Korean companies exploring India through advisory, strategy, localization, and relationship building — emphasizing cultural, regulatory, and strategic alignment.

2023.title: Starajin India Established
2023.desc: Starajin India Private Limited is incorporated in Mulashi, Maharashtra (India) on 12 July 2023, establishing a local corporate presence to better support market entry and operations for clients.

2024.title: Partnership & Upskilling Initiatives
2024.desc: Starajin initiates strategic collaboration efforts with KOSME (Korea SMEs and Startups Agency) and Pimpri Chinchwad Education Trust / Pimpri Chinchwad University (PCET/PCU), co-designing workforce upskilling and talent development programs tailored for Korean companies in Pune.

2025a.title: Korea Business Center & KFC Launch
2025a.desc: Starajin plays a key role in establishing the Korea Business Center (KBC) at PCET Pune under KOSME GBC New Delhi authorization. CEO Yujin Han leads the coordination and launch of the Korea Facilitation Centre (KFC) at Pimpri Chinchwad University, alongside a milestone MoU between KOSME GBC New Delhi and PCU.

2025b.title: DIDAC India & K-SS Day 2025
2025b.desc: Starajin participates in DIDAC India 2025 at the Korea Pavilion, showcasing its Industry–Academia collaboration model. Starajin supports the Proclamation Ceremony for 'Korea SMEs & Startups Day in India,' hosted by KOSME, where CEO Yujin Han contributes as Master of Ceremonies.

hero.title: Our Projects & Partnerships
hero.subtitle: Discover our successful initiatives bridging Korean and Indian businesses, cultures, and communities

stats.title: Our Impact
stats.subtitle: Measurable results from our Korea-India initiatives

items.title: Rising Rajasthan – G2B Partnership with Softberry
items.description: Strategic G2B MoU between Softberry and Rajasthan Government at the Rising Rajasthan Global Investment Summit, facilitating Korean business investments and technology transfer into India's largest state.

items.title: PCU-KOSME Korea Facilitation Centre
items.description: Establishment of Korea Facilitation Centre at Pimpri Chinchwad University in partnership with KOSME, creating a dedicated hub for Korean SME entry into the Indian market.

items.title: Sogang University – India Innovation Hub Partnerships
items.description: Multi-institutional MoU partnerships connecting Sogang University with India's T-Hub Hyderabad and PCU, fostering academic exchange and startup ecosystem collaboration.

items.title: B2B MoU & Strategic Partnerships
items.description: Portfolio of strategic B2B MoUs including ISCMA-Starajin, Verywords-Starajin, and Medical Cosmetics partnerships facilitating cross-border business collaborations.

items.title: KOFICE Cultural Exchange Program
items.description: KOFICE-supported cultural exchange project promoting Korean cultural content across Indian cities, fostering cross-cultural understanding and K-culture appreciation.

items.title: Nami Island India-Korea Artist Camp
items.description: Collaborative artist exchange program at Nami Island bringing together Korean and Indian artists for creative workshops, exhibitions, and cultural dialogue.

items.title: Super 30 Korean Publication & Book Concert
items.description: Korean translation and publication of the Indian bestseller 'Super 30' by Anand Kumar, launched with book concerts at ICCK Diwali Ball and multiple Korean venues.

items.title: KTO Edu Tour Roadshow 2025
items.description: Korea Tourism Organization Educational Tour Roadshow conducted across Pune and Hyderabad, connecting Indian travel industry professionals with Korean tourism opportunities.

items.title: OKTA World Business Expo – B2B Meetings
items.description: Starajin-facilitated B2B matchmaking sessions at OKTA World Business Expo in Incheon, connecting Korean overseas business network with Indian enterprises.

items.title: Korea SMEs & Startups Day 2025
items.description: Proclamation ceremony and KOSME-STARAJIN DIDAC 2025 event celebrating Korea's SME ecosystem and facilitating partnerships with Indian startups and enterprises.

items.title: India-Korea Industry B2B Meetings
items.description: Ongoing series of industry-specific B2B meetings including OFKOS, GS-Patanjali, KRAFTON, Rossari, and Jagruti partnerships across chemicals, gaming, biotech, and manufacturing sectors.

items.title: India-Korea Government & Industry Forums
items.description: High-level government and industry engagements including India Forum 2026, KOIMA Sub-Committee, MIDC-KOSME meetings, and bilateral ministerial consultations driving institutional cooperation.

choose.title: What Sets STARAJIN Apart
choose.subtitle: Integrated Strategy. Coordinated Execution. One Seamless System

items.title: 18+ Years of Hands-On India Market Experience
items.description: We don’t rely on second-hand knowledge. Our insights come from years of living, working, and solving real business challenges in India.

items.title: Deep Korea–India cultural, regulatory, and industry insight
items.description: Success in India depends on understanding not just rules, but relationships, expectations, and decision-making styles across borders. We help companies avoid misalignment before it becomes a risk.

items.title: Single-window strategy + execution model
items.description: Instead of managing multiple advisors and service providers, you work with one control tower that integrates legal, financial, operational, and market expertise through our trusted alliance network.

items.title: Proven results across manufacturing, energy, IT, startups, and public sector projects
items.description: From manufacturing and energy to IT, startups, and public-sector collaboration, STARAJIN has supported organizations at different stages of India expansion — from first entry to long-term stabilization.

integration.eyebrow: How We Integrate Strategy and Execution
integration.title: Integrated Strategy. Coordinated Execution. One Seamless System.
integration.lead: Many companies entering India face the same challenge: a well-defined strategy that becomes difficult to implement in a complex and unfamiliar environment.
integration.leadBold: At STARAJIN, strategy is never separated from execution.
integration.leadDetail: From the beginning, we design market entry and expansion plans with implementation in mind — ensuring that decisions made at headquarters translate effectively into on-the-ground operations in India.

steps.title: Designing the Right Structure
steps.intro: Before execution begins, we focus on clarity.
steps.desc: We work with you to define:
bullets: The most suitable market entry model
steps.closing: Strategy is not just an idea — it is a structure ready to be implemented.

steps.title: Connecting Strategy to the Right Expertise
steps.intro: Execution in India requires multiple areas of specialization — legal, tax, compliance, operations, and local market integration.
steps.desc: Instead of leaving you to manage these separately, STARAJIN brings them together through our alliance network of trusted partners.
steps.closing: You don't just receive advice — you receive coordinated expertise aligned to your strategy.

steps.title: Coordinating Across Borders and Stakeholders
steps.intro: As your project moves forward, STARAJIN acts as a single-window control tower.
bullets: Align headquarters decisions with local realities
Facilitate communication between Korean and Indian stakeholders
Monitor progress and adjust direction when needed
steps.closing: Strategy stays alive — and adaptable — throughout execution.

steps.title: Supporting Stabilization and Growth
steps.intro: Our role doesn't end once operations begin.
steps.closing: Because successful execution is not a moment — it is a process.

highlights: Structure-First Thinking – Strategy designed for real-world execution
Alliance-Driven Expertise – Legal, financial, and operational support integrated
Single-Window Coordination – One control tower, multiple capabilities
Bilateral Alignment – Bridging headquarters and India operations
Long-Term Partnership – From entry to stabilization and growth

items.description: Identifying and facilitating Joint Venture / technology transfer opportunities between Indian and Korean firms. Supporting collaborations in technical textiles, smart manufacturing, and precision agriculture.
